name: Café Jazz Sessions im July
description: Café Jazzat the Bhavan!How do musicians jump into a jam? How do they jam with each other in a trio or quartet?Come see and listen to musicians improvise and mentor younger musicians on their path to becoming creative jazz musicians at the27thEdition ofCafé Jazz SessionsonJuly 25, 2025.Started in 2022 by one of the pioneers of jazz in the city,Jagadeesh M R, Director ofThe Bangalore School of Musicand founder ofMoonArraWorld Fusion Ensemble, this is a monthly event, designed to building a community of jazz musicians in the city and foster a culture of creativity. It is a platform to connect with each other and audiences through jam sessions, lecture demonstrations and performances. The project has fostered a faithful community of musicians who participate and interactfreely with younger jazz aspirants while audiences get a rare opportunity to watch, listen and understand the creative processes in jazz.Free entry!Musicians to register via Whatsapp +91 9844245577 for a spot.
